techmeme.title: US charges leaders of white supremacist gang The Terrorgram Collective, which uses Telegram to celebrate attacks on minorities, with trying to incite a race war (Reuters)
Apple will release iOS 18, macOS 15, iPadOS 18, and watchOS 11 on September 16 (Andrew Cunningham/Ars Technica)
The iPhone 16 will start at $799 and the 16 Plus $899, and the iPhone 16 Pro starts at $999 and the Pro Max starts at $1,199; all base models have 128GB (Valentina Palladino/Engadget)
The touch-sensitive Camera Control button on the iPhone 16 models can launch an AI-powered Visual Intelligence feature and be used to control the camera app (Pranav Dixit/Engadget)
Apple unveils iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max with larger 6.3" and 6.9" displays, four titanium finishes, Camera Control, A18 Pro, new 48mp ultrawide camera, and more (Hartley Charlton/MacRumors)
